sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Bash-&bash-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: bash, sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, size Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Gawk: awk Sed: sed Sh-utils: basename, echo, expr, hostname, sleep, uname Texinfo: install-info Textutils: cat, tr, uniq
